lang.show_usage: chelper lang show - Show current language

auth.revoke_confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key?
auth.get_api_key_hint: To obtain API Key, please visit: {{url}}
auth.reload_usage: chelper auth reload <tool> - Reload plan configuration to the tool
auth.reload_missing_config: Missing plan or API key configuration. Please run 'chelper auth' first.
auth.reload_tool_not_supported: Tool '{{tool}}' is not supported for reload
auth.service_not_supported: Service '{{service}}' is not supported, support glm_coding_plan_global and glm_coding_plan_china.

wizard.banner_subtitle: Manage Your Claude Code and Other Coding Tools
wizard.privacy_note: We value your privacy. All configurations are stored locally only.
wizard.input_your_api_key: Please input your API key here, Enter to confirm:
wizard.install_skipped: Installation skipped. You can install manually later.
wizard.action_load_glm: Apply Configuration - (Apply the GLM Coding Plan you set up to {{tool}})
wizard.action_unload_glm: Unload Configuration - (Remove GLM Coding Plan configuration from {{tool}})
wizard.glm_config_loaded: GLM configuration loaded successfully, you can now use {{tool}} for coding, or configure MCP services to enhance capabilities.
wizard.confirm_unload_glm: Are you sure you want to unload GLM Coding Plan configuration from {{tool}}?
wizard.tool_not_supported: This operation is not supported for this tool
wizard.missing_config: Missing required configuration (plan or API key)
wizard.no_preset_mcp_installed: No Plan Built-in MCP services installed yet
wizard.action_install_all_mcp: Install All Plan Built-in MCP Services
wizard.install_all_mcp_confirm: Are you sure you want to install all plan Built-in MCP services? This will install the following services:
wizard.installing_all_mcp: Batch installing plan Built-in MCP services...
wizard.all_mcp_installed: All plan Built-in MCP services installed successfully
wizard.all_mcp_install_failed: Some plan Built-in MCP services failed to install
wizard.other_mcp_info: This is a non-builtin MCP service
wizard.confirm_uninstall_other_mcp: Are you sure you want to remove this MCP service?
wizard.api_key_get_hint: To obtain API Key, please visit: {{url}}
wizard.config_out_of_sync: Configuration out of sync, refresh recommended
wizard.action_refresh_glm: Configuration Refresh - (Update {{tool}}'s GLM Coding Plan configuration)
wizard.global_config_warning: ⚠️  Warning: You are modifying the {{tool}} global configuration. Changes will affect all workspaces
wizard.start_tool: Start {{tool}} - (Recommendation: open a new terminal in your workspace and run {{shell}} to start it)
wizard.factory_droid_login_hint: Attention:you need to sign in to your Factory Droid account inside the Factory Droid client before using it.
wizard.api_key_invalid: API Key is invalid or expired
wizard.api_key_network_error: Network error, please check your connection

doctor.api_key_invalid: API Key is invalid or expired
doctor.claude_code_not_installed: Claude Code is not installed. Please install it from https://claude.ai/download
doctor.glm_plan_not_configured: GLM Coding Plan not configured. Run 'chelper init' to configure.
doctor.git_not_installed: Git is not installed. Please install Git from https://git-scm.com/downloads

messages.first_run: First run detected. Starting initialization wizard...

install.permission_detected: Permission issue detected, attempting to resolve...
install.windows_solutions: Windows users, please try one of the following solutions:
install.windows_solution_2_title: Solution 2: Use user-level installation (no admin required)
install.unix_solutions: Please manually try one of the following solutions:
install.unix_solution_1_desc: Run the following command in terminal (requires admin password):
install.unix_solution_2_title: Solution 2 (Recommended): Use nvm to manage Node.js
install.unix_solution_2_desc: Using nvm avoids permission issues and is recommended by npm official
install.path_warning: Please add the following path to your PATH environment variable:
install.what_next: What would you like to do next?
install.still_not_installed: {{tool}} still does not appear to be installed
install.skip_install_confirm: Skip the installation and install manually?
install.retry_check: Would you like to check the installation status again?
install.manual_action_detected: The installer maybe requires additional manual steps (see output above)
install.confirm_manual_action_done: Have you completed the required manual steps?
install.complete_manual_action_hint: Please complete the required steps shown above, then re-run the installation
install.factory_irm_install_tip:
It may be due to your environment not supporting the irm installation command. It is recommended that you execute the above command in a PowerShell window to install it yourself, or refer to the official website for installation https://docs.factory.ai/cli/getting-started/quickstart 
 After self-installation, you need to create a new command line window and rerun the wizard
